data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guadanucci, José Paulo L., Gallon, Richard C. (2008): A revision of the spider genera Chaetopelma Ausserer 1871 and Nesiergus Simon 1903 (Araneae, Theraphosidae, Ischnocolinae). Zootaxa 1753: 34-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181769
